title: QR Code-Based Collaborative Learning Sports Skill Education Program

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational Theories of Sports Science and Basic Experimental Methods
context.additional_context: A technical training course for current practitioners, conducted in an offline classroom setting utilizing digital devices (tablets/smartphones)

learning_goals: Learners can accurately navigate and utilize multimedia resources (videos/3D models) related to sports techniques with over 90% accuracy using QR codes
By applying collaborative learning strategies (Think-Pair-Share, Jigsaw, etc.), learners can solve sports technique problems with over 85% participation rate alongside peer practitioners
Learners achieve a knowledge retention rate of at least 25% higher in post-assessments conducted one month after course completion compared to pre-assessments
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
